CustomField.formula:
If(isblank( X3_Firm_Proposal_Submitted__c ),"........................", "(3) " & If(len(text(Month(X3_Firm_Proposal_Submitted__c))) = 1, "0" & text(Month( X3_Firm_Proposal_Submitted__c)), text(Month( X3_Firm_Proposal_Submitted__c))) & "/" & If (len(text(Day( X3_Firm_Proposal_Submitted__c))) =1, "0" & text(Day( X3_Firm_Proposal_Submitted__c)), text(Day(X3_Firm_Proposal_Submitted__c))) & "/" & text(Year(X3_Firm_Proposal_Submitted__c)))
&" " &
If(isblank( X4_Project_Awarded_written_evidence__c ),".............................. ", "(4) " & IF(len(text(Month( X4_Project_Awarded_written_evidence__c))) = 1, "0" & text(Month( X4_Project_Awarded_written_evidence__c)), text(Month( X4_Project_Awarded_written_evidence__c))) & "/" & If (len(text(Day( X4_Project_Awarded_written_evidence__c))) =1, "0" & text(Day( X4_Project_Awarded_written_evidence__c)), text(Day( X4_Project_Awarded_written_evidence__c))) & "/" & text(Year( X4_Project_Awarded_written_evidence__c)))
CustomField.label: zzArc(3)Firm Proposal (4)Project Awarded
